thumb.title: ボイドロイド／NYL・VY1v4・夜語トバリ | SV・V4・NEUTRINOカバー
thumb.description: I got the starry court loids!!! and my first nyl and tobari usage.Original & PV: @r-906⁩ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KhmFHCivKOcOriginal Vocals: HARU, Miku_Dark, UnaUST: ⁨@altalt23⁩Tuning, Edits & Mixing: me Vocals Used:NYL (c) ⁨@eclipsedsounds⁩ VY1v4_Normal XSY v4_Soft (c) YAMAHATobari (c) ニコライ・ボルコフ No Copyright indeedI don't own the rights to the song/voicebank/character/illustrations/project fileEverything belongs to their respective owners
